original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, users as u WHERE c.UserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=7931 AND u.Views<=109 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 13:12:56' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 7931 AND users.Views <= 109 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 13:12:56'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.UserId)
